message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $90. I'm willing to consider $110. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $110 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $105. Is that a price you'd be comfortable with?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to go down to $98?
I'm starting to think we're close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $102. Is that a price you'd be willing to accept?
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm not sure I can go up to $102. Would you be willing to meet me at $97?
I think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $99. Is that a price you'd be willing to accept?
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm not sure I can go up to $99. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
